DataAssessmentFieldMetric.name: DataAssessmentFieldMetric
DataAssessmentFieldMetric.description: Represents summary statistics for matched, blank, and differing fields in account records of an org compared to records in Data.com.

DataAssessmentMetricId.description: A unique number that identifies the parent DataAssessmentMetric record.

FieldName.description: The name of the assessed field.

Name.description: An optional field used to name your record.

NumMatchedBlanks.description: The number of matched records that contain blank fields.

NumMatchedDifferent.description: The number of matched records that have a different value for this field.

NumMatchedInSync.description: The number of matched records that have the same value for this field.

NumUnmatchedBlanks.description: The number of unmatched records that contain blank fields.
